EmailTemplate.description: Adaptive Insights Partner Community registration (this is for Partner prospects who register)
EmailTemplate.name: 1B. Partner Community Registration Template - Custom
EmailTemplate.subject: Adaptive Insights Partner Community Registration
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Lead.Name},
Thank you for your interest in the Adaptive Insights Partner Program!
Our program is designed with your success in mind and we understand that your participation in any partner program requires commitment and a good fit with your business model.
We’re evaluating the information that you’ve provided and a member of our team will be in touch with you shortly.
If you need any assistance during this time, please connect with us directly at partners@adaptiveinsights.com
The Adaptive Insights Channel Team
